pos_examples: Now, take image of direction star_213 using instrument rain in mode socket on satellite object_260.
Once you are done, please turn satellite frame_9 from direction bastion to direction screen.
First, switch on instrument dress_red on satellite kumquat_8 and then calibrate instrument fire on satellite yew pointing at direction roof_11.
The next step is to switch off instrument teddy on satellite kumquat.
